entry.title: From Complex Scientific Notebook to User-Friendly Web Application
entry.summary:
Description

Learn how to show your work with the MERCURY framework. This open-source tool perfectly matches your computed notebook (e.g., written in Jupyter Notebook). Without knowledge of frontend technologies, you can present your results as a web app (with interactive widgets), report, dashboard, or report. Learn how to improve …
entry.content:
Description

Learn how to show your work with the MERCURY framework. This open-source tool perfectly matches your computed notebook (e.g., written in Jupyter Notebook). Without knowledge of frontend technologies, you can present your results as a web app (with interactive widgets), report, dashboard, or report. Learn how to improve your notebook and make your work understandable for non-technical mates. Python only!

entry.title: Posters Spotlight
entry.content:
Description

Posters Spotlight from the EuroSciPy 2023 conference held in Basel. Abstract and link to the posters: https://www.euroscipy.org/2023/poster_session.html
